invite.Description: Invite link for Roki to join your server.

channelinfo.Description: Shows information about the current channel/mentioned channel.

ping.Description: Gets current ping to Discord's servers

commands.Description: List all commands and their aliases from a module. You can either specify the full/the first few letters of the module name.

h.Description: Shows help details regarding specific commands. If no command is specified, DM's you more information about commands in general.

time.Description: Shows the current date and time for the specified location. Also includes date and time in local culture if exists. If no location specified, defaults to Toronto, ON, Canada.

youtube.Description: Searches Youtube with specified query. Returns the top result.

image.Description: Searches Google Images with the specified query. Returns top result.

randomimage.Description: Searches Google Images with the specified query. Returns a random result.

movie.Description: Searches omdb with the specified query, returns first result.

weather.Description: Looks up weather of specified location using wttr.in. If no location is specified, defaults to Toronto, ON, Canada.

urbandict.Description: Searches urban dictionary for with the specified query. Returns top results.

addquote.Description: Adds a new quote with the specified name and message. (quote name isn't required to be unique)
Usage: {0}. einstein Imagination is more important than knowledge.

showquote.Description: Shows a quote with the specified quote name. If there are multiple quotes with the same name, one is chosen at random.

quotesearch.Description: Shows a random quote that contains the specified word.

quoteid.Description: Displays the quote with the specified ID. Quote IDs can be found by typing `{0}liqu [page]`.

quotedelete.Description: Deletes a quote with the specified ID. Use `{0}qdk` to delete by quote name. You must be the creator of the quote or a moderator to delete it.

quotedeletekeyword.Description: Deletes a quote with the specified name. You must be the creator of the quote or a moderator to delete it.

listquotes.Description: Lists all quotes on the server ordered alphabetically. 15 quotes per page.

textoimage.Description: Returns an image with the rendered LaTeX.

pokedex.Description: Returns the Pokédex entry of the specified Pokémon's name or ID. (TEMP REMOVED)

ability.Description: Returns the description of the specified ability. (TEMP REMOVED)

move.Description: Returns the description of the specified move. (TEMP REMOVED)

item.Description: Returns the description of the specified item. (TEMP REMOVED)

pins.Description: Returns the latest pin in the current channel.

xkcd.Description: Returns the specified xkcd comic. If no comic is specified, latest comic is shown.

queue.Description: Searches and adds the specified song to the music queue. If the queue is empty, plays the song instead. Able load youtube urls and playlists. Must be in a voice channel.

play.Description: Plays a specific track # in the queue. Must be in a voice channel.

autoplay.Description: Enables/Disables autoplay for the current player. Automatically plays a related track to the last track played. Mutually exclusive with loop (i.e. only one can be enabled). Must be in a voice channel.

queueloop.Description: Enables/Disables loop for the current player. Restarts the player queue from the beginning once reached the end. Mutually exclusive with autoplay (i.e. only one can be enabled). Must be in a voice channel.

pause.Description: Pauses the current track playing. Must be in a voice channel.

resume.Description: Un-pauses the current paused track. Must be in a voice channel.

destroy.Description: Stops Roki from playing music, removes her from the voice channel. Must be in a voice channel.

volume.Description: Shows the current volume set. Specify a new volume for the music player to change it. Between 0-100. Must be in a voice channel

listqueue.Description: Shows the current track queue (10 tracks per page).

songremove.Description: Removes the specified track # in the queue. Must be in voice channel.

songseek.Description: Seeks the given number of seconds forward in the current track. Must be in voice channel.

twitter.Description: Returns the latest tweets by the specified user.

twittersearch.Description: Searches twitter with the specified query, and returns the top 5 results.

anime.Description: Searches anilist for the specified query. Returns top 5 results.

experience.Description: Shows your or the specified user's XP card.

xpleaderboard.Description: Shows the server's XP leaderboard along with your XP rank. You can also specify a user to get their rank instead.

xpnotification.Description: Sets the preferred location of level up notifications.

pick.Description: Picks up all the currency dropped in the current channel.

leaderboard.Description: Shows the current currency leaderboard along with your currency rank. You can also specify a user to get their rank instead.

drop.Description: Drops the specified number of currency in the current channel, default is 1. Must have enough in your balance to drop.

betflip.Description: Bet to guess result of a coin flip.

give.Description: Transfers currency to the specified user, optionally with a message. Must have sufficient balance.

cash.Description: Shows your or the specified players cash balance.

investing.Description: Shows how much currency in the Investing Account.

betroll.Description: Bet to roll `1d100`. Rolling over 70 yields rewards. The higher the roll the better the payout.

betflipmulti.Description: Bet to guess multiple coin flips. You need to bet at least twice as much as the number of guesses. The more correct guesses pays out more.

betpokemongame.Description: Bet on an AI vs AI game of pokemon. Default is Generation 8 (Available Generations: 4-8). Correct guess results in payout.

betpokemonreplay.Description: Gets the replay of a bet pokemon game.

trivia.Description: Starts a new 10 question trivia game with optional category (use `{0}tc` to check categories). Default is all categories. Awards currency based on difficulty.

store.Description: Shows the server's item store. Specify item name or id to see details of item.

buy.Description: Buy the specified amount of an item from the store using its name or id

mute.Description: Mutes the specified user (Prevents them from speaking in voice). Must be a moderator/have an available power (Consumes the power). (TEMP DISABLED)

block.Description: Blocks the specified user (Prevents them from typing in chat). Must be a moderator/have an available power (Consumes the power). (TEMP DISABLED)

timeout.Description: Times out the specified user (Prevents them from typing and speaking). Must be a moderator/have an available power (Consumes the power). Does not stack with `.mute` and `.block`. (TEMP DISABLED)

inventory.Description: Shows the items in your inventory.

stocknews.Description: Shows the current news regarding the specified ticker.

stockcompany.Description: Shows details about the company of the specified ticker.

stockprice.Description: Shows the current price of the specified ticker.

stockbuy.Description: Purchase shares of a company at market price. Funds are taken from investing account.

stocksell.Description: Sells shares of a company at market price. Funds are deposited into your investing account

transfer.Description: Transfers currency the specified amount of currency to or from your cash or investing account.

portfolio.Description: Shows your or the specified user's investing portfolio.

userdetails.Description: Shows the mentioned user's UserID, Username, Discriminator, and Avatar ID

events.Description: Create, edit, or lists current events in the server.

uwu.Description: UwUizes the message. If no message is provided, UwUizes the last message in the channel.

jeopardy.Description:
Starts a Jeopardy! game in the current channel. Choose a price from the categories, and give the correct answer to win.
If a game is active in the current channel, the current question will be sent again.

jeopardyleaderboard.Description: Shows the score leaderboard for the current Jeopardy! game.

jeopardystop.Description: Stops current Jeopardy! game after the current question.

jeopardyvote.Description: Votes to skip the current question. Can vote if you have a score in the current game. Voting opens 12 seconds after clue is shown.

wikipedia.Description: Searches Wikipedia for an article. Can also specify top search results.

ask.Description: Asks Roki a question. Uses Wolfram|Alpha to get answers.
Usage: {0}ask what is the tallest building in the world

xprewards.Description: Shows the XP rewards for the current server.

notsafeforwork.Description: Sends random NSFW/Porn image. Requires NSFW Channel.

ass.Description: Sends random image of asses. Requires NSFW Channel.

boobs.Description: Sends random image of boobs. Requires NSFW Channel.

cosplay.Description: Sends random image of cosplays. Requires NSFW Channel.

hentai.Description: Sends random image of hentai. Requires NSFW Channel.

mild.Description: Sends random mild nsfw/sfw image. Requires NSFW Channel.

nsfwgifs.Description: Sends random NSFW/Porn gif. Requires NSFW Channel.

trans.Description: Sends random image of trans/traps. Requires NSFW Channel.

chesschallenge.Description: Challenge a user to a chess game by mentioning them.

kick.Description: Kick a user from the server.

ban.Description: Ban a user from the server.

prune.Description: Deletes up to the specified number of messages of the mentioned user (not guaranteed to delete the exact specified number). Only searches up to the past 500 total messages.
